DataElement.preferredName: Patient Cerebrospinal Fluid Diagnostic Procedure Contraindicated Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not cerebrospinal fluid diagnostic procedures are contraindicated for the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Cerebrospinal Fluid Diagnostic Procedure Contraindicated
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The fluid that is contained within the brain ventricles, the subarachnoid space and the central canal of the spinal cord._Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder._State of a particular method of treatment, regimen, procedure, medication, etc. of being unsuitable and inadvisable, often because of a likely adverse reaction.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.
